Module MC_ALaLogic_folder-separator.lua ¶

Draw separator on folder track - aka A la Logic X

MC_ALaLogic_folder-separator.lua.cleanArrangeView() ¶

remove all items from arrange view. This function is called with reaper.atexit()

MC_ALaLogic_folder-separator.lua.getLastElementTimeEnd() ¶

We get the end of the lastest element in the project. Element means items, markers and regions

Return Values
(int)

lastElementTimeEnd is the time in second of the end of the last element on the timeline
